uc3m.bomberman.entity

Class Player

  • java.lang.Object
    • uc3m.bomberman.entity.Entity
      • uc3m.bomberman.entity.MovableEntity
        • uc3m.bomberman.entity.Player

  • public class Player
extends MovableEntity
    This class overrides some unimplemented methods of MovableEntity and creates the object for Player. It also holds all the parameters and methods regarding to the player.
